p: After the first week, the reduction reached 20% for PCS at the dose of 25 and 25% for the dose of 50. After that, diabetic condition and hyperglycemia were successfully controlled indicated by a significant reduction ( p < 0.001) (Day 14: 35,58,44%; Day 21: 44,61,63%; Day 28: 57,65,73% for doses 25, 50 and, glibenclamide, respectively) compared to the negative control.
